comment-list.a11y-filter-correct: Filters all comments marked as correct
comment-list.a11y-filter-wrong: Filters all comments marked as wrong
comment-list.a11y-select-time: Option to set the period for the comments to be displayed
comment-list.a11y-select-time-1h: Show all comments of the last hour
comment-list.a11y-select-time-3h: Show all comments of the last 3 hours
comment-list.a11y-select-time-1d: Show all comments of the last day
comment-list.a11y-select-time-1w: Show all comments of the last week
comment-list.comment-stream-stopped: The comment stream has been stopped.
comment-list.comment-stream-started: The comment stream has been started.

comment-page.a11y-shortcuts: To create a comment, press key 1. Once there are multiple comments, you can search and filter comments. To browse the comments press key 2, to sort comments key 3, to filter comments key 4, to select the time period key 5, to pause or resume the comment stream key 6, to go to the first comment key 7, to go to the user menu key 9, to go back to the room overview key 0 or the escape key to repeat this announcement
comment-page.a11y-shortcuts-moderation: Once there are multiple comments, you can search and filter comments. To browse the comments press key 1, to sort comments key 2, to select the time period key 3, to go to the first comment key 4, to go to the public comment list key 5, to go to the user menu key 9, to go back to the room overview key 0 or the escape key to repeat this announcement.
comment-page.a11y-message: You are now on the comments page. To get information about key combinations press the Enter key or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
comment-page.a11y-message-moderation: You are now on the moderation page. To get information about key combinations press the Enter key or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
comment-page.a11y-comment-grade: Marks this comment as a favorite
comment-page.a11y-comment-banish: Bans this comment from the public comment list
comment-page.a11y-comment-reject: Puts this comment on the public comment list
comment-page.a11y-comment-not-marked-wrong: Marks this comment as not correct
comment-page.a11y-comment-answered: Go to your answer of this comment
comment-page.a11y-text-correct: This comment was marked as correct.
comment-page.a11y-text-grade: This comment was marked as a favorite.
comment-page.a11y-text-read: This comment was discussed in full view.
comment-page.a11y-text-wrong: The comment was answered in the negative.
comment-page.a11y-message-answer: You are now on the comment answer page. To get information about key combinations press the Enter key now or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
comment-page.a11y-shortcuts-answer: To post a reply or go to your reply press 1, to go to the user menu press 9, to return to the comments page press 0 or the escape key to repeat this announcement
comment-page.a11y-enter-answer: Enter an answer to this comment here.
comment-page.a11y-entered-answer: You have answered the comment with {{answer}}.
comment-page.a11y-delete-answer: Deletes your answer to this comment
comment-page.a11y-save-answer: Saves your answer to this comment
comment-page.a11y-edit-answer: Option to edit the answer for this comment
comment-page.a11y-close: Close the answer dialog and return to comment list
comment-page.a11y-rejected: moved to the public comment list.
comment-page.comment: Comment {{ comment }} was asked at {{ time }} and has currently {{ votes }}. {{correct}} {{wrong}} {{bonus}} {{read}} {{answer}}
comment-page.mark-read: You discussed this comment in full screen mode
comment-page.new-comment: A new comment with the content, {{ comment }}, has been asked.
comment-page.search-box-input-description: Here you can search for comment.

content.a11y-content-create-message: You can now create a new question. Press the Enter key to get information about key combinations or call up the announcement later via the Escape key.
content.a11y-content-edit-message: You can now edit your question.
content.a11y-content-create-shortcuts: To enter a new question press key 1, to change the question format press key 2, to change the collection press key 3, to access the user menu press key 9, to return to the room overview press key 0 or the escape key to repeat this announcement
content.a11y-enter-body: Enter the question here. Note: This text field supports text formatting with markdown.
content.a11y-enter-flashcard-answer: Enter the answer here. Note: This text field supports text formatting with markdown.
content.a11y-enter-content-group: Use the arrow keys to select one of your content groups or crate a new one by entering.
content.a11y-enter-answer: Enter a new answer here and press the enter key to add it.
content.a11y-enter-another-answer: Enter another answer or go back to select right and wrong answers.
content.a11y-answer-checkbox: Use the space bar to determine whether the answer {{answer}} is right or wrong.
content.a11y-answer-marked-correct: You have marked the answer as correct
content.a11y-answer-marked-wrong: You have marked the answer as wrong
content.a11y-answer-added: Answer has been added, go back to delete, edit or mark the answer as correct or incorrect
content.a11y-choose-format: Change the format of your question. THe current format is {{format}}
content.a11y-single-choice: Currently you've chosen the format Single-Choice. Switch to multiple-choice with the arrow keys.
content.a11y-multiple-choice: Currently you've chosen the format multiple choice. Switch to Single-Choice with the arrow keys.
content.a11y-answer-yes: Currently the answer to this question is “Yes”. Change to “No” with the arrow keys.
content.a11y-answer-no: Currently the answer to this question is “No”. Change to “Yes” with the arrow keys.
content.a11y-answer-neither: Currently there is no correct answer selected for this question.
content.a11y-submit: Creates the entered question in your collection {{group}}.
content.a11y-content-created: Yor content has been saved. You can now create a new content.
content.a11y-preview: Shows a preview of the entered content.
content.a11y-preview-header: Below you will find your question from the perspective of the participants.
content.a11y-leave-preview: Brings you back to the creation of contents.
content.a11y-back-in-creation: You are now back in the content creation.
content.a11y-content-list-message: You are now in your content collection {{name}}. Press the Enter key to get information about key combinations or call up the announcement later via the Escape key.
content.a11y-content-list-shortcuts: To create a new question press key 1, to navigate to the statistics key 2, to open a menu for more settings key 3, to lock or unlock the content key 4, to go to the collection questions key 5, to edit the name of the collection key 6, to go to the user menu key 9, to go back to the room overview key 0 or the escape key to repeat this announcement.
content.a11y-content-list-contents: The collection contains {{count}} questions. Navigate through your questions with the tab key now.
content.a11y-edit-content-group-name: Change the name of the collection here
content.a11y-create-content: Create a new content for this collection
content.a11y-nav-to-stats: Navigate to the statistics of this collection
content.a11y-open-group-settings: Open a menu for more settings
content.a11y-lock-collection: Lock all questions of this collection
content.a11y-statistics-are-published: The statistics are published for participants
content.a11y-statistics-are-not-published: The statistics are locked for participants
content.a11y-correct-options-are-published: The correct answers are published for participants
content.a11y-correct-options-are-not-published: The correct answers are locked for participants
content.a11y-selected-content: You have now selected the question {{name}}.
content.a11y-unlock-contents-up-to: Release all questions up to here
content.a11y-lock-contents-up-to: Lock all questions up to here
content.a11y-all-published: All questions of this collection are published.
content.a11y-more-options: Show more options for this question
content.a11y-add-to-content-group: Add this question to another collection
content.a11y-add-to-this-content-group: Add this question to the collection {{name}}
content.a11y-new-content-group: Add this question to a new collection
content.a11y-remove-content-from-group: Remove this question from collection. If the question is no longer in any collection, the question will be archived.
content.a11y-archived-contents: You are now in the view for your archived questions. Here you can add single questions to a collection or create a new collection with all archived questions.
content.a11y-archived-create: Creates a collection which contains all archived questions.
content.a11y-archived-create-with-name: Creates a collection with the name {{name}} which contains all archived questions.
content.a11y-edit-content-group-sort: Start the sorting of the collection
content.a11y-delete-answers: Delete all answers to this question
content.a11y-delete-all-answers: Delete all answers of this collection
content.answers-deleted: Answers to this question got deleted.
content.all-answers-deleted: Answers of this collection got deleted.
content.at-least-one: Please select at least 1 correct answer.
content.unsaved-answer: You haven't added the last answer yet.
content.need-answers: Please add at least two answers.
content.no-empty: No empty fields allowed. Please check your question.
content.only-one: Please select exactly one correct answer.
content.max-answers: There's a maximum of eight answers.
content.same-answer: Same answer label is not allowed.
content.answer-neither: Do not set a correct answer
content.content-group-update-failed: Something went wrong. Maybe the collection is already present?
content.added-to-content-group: Your question was added to collection.
content.md-info: In this input field text formatting with Markdown is supported.
content.archived-contents-description: Here you can see questions which have not been assigned to a collection. Add single questions to an existing or a new collection or create a new collection containing all archived questions.
content.format-choice-description: Participants can choose from several answer options. There can be one or more correct answers.
content.format-scale-description: One of the predefined answers can be selected.
content.format-binary-description: It can be answered with "Yes" or "No". None of the options must be correct.
content.format-text-description: Participants can answer the question with a text entry.
content.format-slide-description: Slides are used to present information.
content.format-sort-description: Participants can answer the question by ordering the answers.
content.format-flashcard-description: With flashcards participants can learn with front and back.
content.format-not-supported: This format is currently not supported.

survey.a11y-message: You are now in live survey mode. Press the Enter key to get information about key combinations or use the Escape key to call up the announcement later.
survey.a11y-shortcuts: To know the status of the current survey press key 5, to start or stop the survey press key 1, to change the type of survey press key 2, to access the user menu press key 9, to return to the room overview press key 0 or the escape key to repeat this announcement
survey.a11y-status: Currently the survey is {{status}}. {{answers}} participants have answered yet. {{state0}} percent have selected answer {{answer0}}, {{state1}} percent have selected answer {{answer1}}, {{state2}} percent have selected answer {{answer2}}, {{state3}} percent have selected answer {{answer3}}.
survey.a11y-status-changed: The survey has been {{status}}. Press enter to {{nextStatus}} the survey.
survey.a11y-change-type: Changes the type of the survey.
survey.a11y-first-stop-survey: You have to stop the survey before you can change the type.

room-page.a11y-settings: Navigates to the settings where you can manage the room and its comments and add moderators or categories.
room-page.a11y-statistics: Opens the statistics for your question collections.
room-page.a11y-shortcuts: To access the comment overview press key 1, to access the moderation overview key 2, to create a new question key 3, to access the live poll key 4, to navigate through your question collections key 5, to navigate to statistics key 6, to view more options for the room key 7, to announce the current user count key 8, to access the user menu key 9, to access the back button key 0 or the escape key to repeat this announcement.
room-page.a11y-room-message: You're now in your room {{room}} with the key {{key}}. To get information about key combinations press the Enter key or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
room-page.a11y-create-content: Opens a form to create new questions.
room-page.a11y-content-groups: In this room there are {{count}} Question collections. Tab between them and press Enter to edit questions or settings in the collection.
room-page.a11y-no-content-groups: There are no questions in this room yet. Press key 4 to create a new question.
room-page.a11y-enter-content-group: Opens the collection {{name}}. This collection is {{locked}}.
room-page.a11y-moderator-message: You are now in the room {{room}}, which you are moderating. To get information about key combinations, press the Enter key now or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
room-page.a11y-moderator-shortcuts: To access the comment overview press the key 1, to access the moderation overview the key 2, to access the user menu the key 9, to access the back button the key 0 or the escape key to repeat this announcement
room-page.a11y-moderation-disabled: This room is currently not moderated.
room-page.a11y-share: Opens a dialog box that displays the room link and a QR code. Also you can copy the room adress.
room-page.a11y-switch-role: Switch role to see participants view.
room-page.a11y-more-options: Shows more options for this room in a menu.
room-page.a11y-user-count: Currently there are {{count}} persons in this room.
room-page.a11y-user-count-only-one: Currently you are the only in this room.
room-page.room-loading-error: The room could not be loaded

settings.a11y-message: You are now in the room settings. Press the Enter key to get information about key combinations or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
settings.a11y-shortcuts: To get to the general room settings press key 1 to get to the comment settings key 2, to manage moderators key 3, to manage categories key 4, to get to the user menu key 9, to return to the room overview key 0 or the escape key to repeat this announcement
settings.a11y-room: You are now in the general room settings. Here you can edit the name or the description of the room or delete the room.
settings.a11y-comments: You are now in the comment settings. Here you can adjust the comment settings, export the comment of this room and delete a comment.
settings.a11y-moderators: You are now in the moderator administration. Here you can add or remove moderators.
settings.a11y-categories: You are now in the category administration. Here you can add or remove categories.
settings.a11y-threshold-changed: You have set the threshold to {{value}}.
settings.a11y-add-moderator: Add the entered User as Moderator
settings.a11y-delete-all-comments: Deletes all comments of this room
settings.a11y-export-comments: Exports all comments of this room
settings.a11y-moderator-username: Enter the username or email of the user you want to add as a moderator
settings.a11y-room-name: Give the room a new name here.
settings.a11y-direct-send: Slider to send comments directly to participant
settings.a11y-threshold: Slider for setting the threshold for visible comments
settings.a11y-room-description: Enter a description for the room
settings.a11y-save-changes: Saves the changes to the room.
settings.a11y-collapse-settings: Leave the {{name}} settings or navigate with tab through the settings.
settings.moderator-not-found: No user was found with this E-Mail.
settings.question: Question
settings.tokens-deleted: All tokens of this room have been deleted.
settings.no-bonus: No bonus points have been given yet.
settings.threshold-info: If a threshold value is set, only comments that have received a higher rating are displayed.
settings.direct-send-info: If this setting is deactivated, a moderator or the lecturer must activate new comments before they become publicly visible.

statistic.a11y-message-overview: You are now on the statistics overview. Press the Enter key to get information about key combinations or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
statistic.a11y-message-evaluation: Question {{index}}, {{content}}. There are no answers yet.
statistic.a11y-message-evaluation-answers: Question {{index}}, {{content}}. {{answers}} participants have answered the question. Navigate through the answers with the tab key.
statistic.a11y-message-presentation: You are now in the question presentation. Press the tab key to go to the question and navigate between the questions with the arrow keys.
statistic.a11y-shortcuts-overview: To go to the selection of the question collection press the Tab key. Then navigate through the results of the collection. To get to the user menu press the 9 key, to get back to the room overview press the 0 key or the escape key to repeat this announcement.
statistic.a11y-group-progress: {{percent}} percent of the questions in the collection {{group}} were answered correctly.
statistic.a11y-content-result: The question {{content}} has been answered by {{count}} persons so far, {{abstentions}} persons have abstained.
statistic.a11y-choice-result: The question was answered correctly by {{percent}} percent.
statistic.a11y-go-to-statistic: Press the Enter key to get to the evaluation of the question.
statistic.a11y-no-more-answers: There are no more answers. Press the right arrow key to go to the next one.
statistic.a11y-answer-indicator: Indicates with the color green which answers are correct.
statistic.a11y-show-chart: Shows a bar chart which displays the evaluation of this question.
statistic.a11y-no-answers-yet: There are no answers yet to display.
statistic.a11y-no-more-questions: There are no more questions available.
statistic.show-flashcard-back: Show the back of the flashcard
statistic.hide-flashcard-back: Hide the back of the flashcard

dialog.cancel-description: Cancels the current process and closes the dialog.
dialog.really-reset-form: Do you really want to reset all inputs?

utils.formatting-image-hint: Please note that images with a large file size can affect loading times.
